label: AB2C2_oC20_63_c_f_2c-001
title: Lepidocrocite [$\gamma$-FeO(OH), $E0_{4}$] Structure
comments: (Gottfried, 1937) gave $\gamma$-FeO(OH) the {\em Strukturbericht} designation $E0_{4}$, but did not determine the positions of the hydrogens. Using a deuterated form of FeO(OH) (Christensen, 1982) found that the hydrogen atoms are located on the (8f) Wyckoff sites, but these sites are only 41.7\% occupied.  We use this structure as the prototype.
